name: Saving Patients
description:
I ran into some problems when it came to making the patients disappear…and stopping the script when you get to the winning screen.

Also trying to stop the score from moving when you move your mouse also was a pain and I could not figure it out for the life of me. 

The art for the patients I used for my this class project is belonging to little_pebbles and the background is belonging to 321kye-da0pcrd. The dog is a public image and please inform myself if it is not so I can give credit to his work and not make it as if it is my own.
